name: duq kart
description:
Arrow keys to drive and steer!

THIS IS A PROTOTYPE

TO PLAY:  Download zip  >  Extract zip  >  Run "duq-kart.exe"

This is something I've been working on periodically.  It's nowhere near finished and is still very "rough".  It needs more features and a lot more polish.  For example, it doesn't have any audio yet.

I feel like the skeleton of the game is mostly complete.  I'm proud of the kart controller and feel like it's rock solid.  I can and probably will use the kart controller in other projects.

The AI is very basic, but functional.  It's a tad boring AI behavior, but I was just trying to implement something quick for prototyping purposes.

I've implemented a checkpoint system, lap manager, and position tracker, all of which I'm proud of as it was something new to me and a great learning experience.

I used an asset I got on sale off Unity's Asset Store to procedurally generate the track with custom materials and meshes.  The asset was well worth it and saved a lot of time.  The name of the asset is "Race Track Generator" by MasterPixel3D.

You can find the code for the project on my Github.
